description: SDLTPL files may contain a variety of files, such as .DOC , .DOCX , or .XML files, needed to be translated and reviewed. The templates also store project settings that include the description of the project, the due date of the project, users who can access it, and the source and target language to complete the translation.

You can open an SDLTPL template by selecting File → New → New Project and choosing "Create a project based on a project template". You can create an SDLTPL template by selecting File → Save and choose the SDLTPL template format.
